course_description: Under faculty mentorship, students propose a focused research question and design a reading plan to explore the available evidence in depth through independent study. Students will write a semester paper which describes our current understanding of the topic and critiques the available evidence.
prerequisites: HLTH 210 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
